title: Error with Anvil & Cast - 'Error: Contract 0x0116686e2291dbd5e317f47fadbfb43b599786ef does not exist'

body: I have exactly the same problem. Any help would be great

sorry for the late response, 

this looks odd, I wasn't able to reproduce this with a minimalistic deployment,
I wonder if this has something todo with an error response.

could you perhaps try again with latest forge and maybe prepare a repro so I can properly debug this?

Hi @mattsse , thx for the response, I've created repo when I am learning stuff and pushed it, also tried to work with aave but same errors actually.

Maybe you can pull that and check if its the problem with versions or not - https://github.com/ms4ever7/solidity-learning
Hi there @mattsse , maybe you have some updates on that topic ?

sorry unable to investigate further using your repro atm

repro doesn't work properly, getting compile errors because v2-periphery is fixed to an older compiler

unclear how you managed to make this work

I'd appreciate a minimal reproducible example
